summary: Mod Setup Installer, Package your mod and allow the installer to install your mod for the user
descriptionHtml:
My first modders resource, this little tool allows you to create an installer for your mod, quickly and easily without the need for any additional software just by editing an ini file.

==Features==
Customize "Mod Name" , "Mod Author" , "Mod Description" and "Mod Art Banner".
Ini file driven.
Specify up too 6 files to install.

== How It Works==
The modder, You, simply places the mods files in the folder "/mod/data/" , then opens up the .ini file in the "/mod/MOD.ini" folder and changes the "Mod Name" , "Mod Author" , Mod Description" and the "Mod Art Banner" to suite your needs, then specify the files to install for the user (also in the .ini file) then create a zip file containing the "Mod Installer.exe" and "mod" folder ready to upload to nexus.


==Future Features==
Allow user to pick drive letter of steam folder.
Notification when mod has installed.
Anti-Pirate


==Virus Scare==
I do not plan on giving people viruses EVER, so please don't let that stop you from using this tool :)
Micalov has put this tool in virus scanner and is virus free.


==Additional==
If you use this tool for your mod please pm so that i can add it to the list of mods using this tool. Thanks.

==Newest Version==
The New version is here, the changes are:

--File Optimization, from 14 MB to 1.8 MB.
--Mod Status "Installing" and "Installed".
--Drive Letter changable.
author: IndecentAct
